Player History
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,188,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/1985, off Britt Burns (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Joe Niekro (NYM)...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 6/10/1985...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 5 runs on 6/12/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1985, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/28/1985...
10/10/1985: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $7,600,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1985...
Injured on 6/28/1986 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1986, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Los Angeles on 7/24/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1986, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 7/28/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1988, hitting .464 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 4/30/1988 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1988, hitting .380 with 6 HR, 19 RBI...
Injured on 7/29/1988 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago on 6/13/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1990, hitting .640 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 5/31/1990 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
7/12/1990: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $7,600,000 per year, for 3 years.
Traded from Philadelphia to New York (M) on 4/3/1991 (Going to PHI: P Sid Fernandez. Going to NYM: SS Cal Ripken)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1991, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1991, hitting .609 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 4/21/1992 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 6/25/1992...
